field_additionalbodytext.processed: We would love to keep you up to date about the progress of your patients and new case studies as well as other information relating to iConsult:Cardiology, from Boehringer Ingelheim Animal Health UK Limited, by email. Please let us know if you would like us to contact you. Please see our privacy policy which explains how we process personal data.

field_footertext.processed: If you haven’t received your certificate within a few minutes, please check your junk folder. If you believe the email has not arrived please contact AHpetvetmarketing.GB@boehringer-ingelheim.com for support.

nodeCertificaterequest.field_vetertinarygroup: Which veterinary group do you work for?
nodeCertificaterequest.field_marketingrequest1: Yes please, I’d like to keep in touch with my patients and hear from iConsult:Cardiology
nodeCertificaterequest.field_marketingrequest2: No thanks, I don’t want to follow my cases and hear from iConsult:Cardiology

nodeCertificateresponse.field_calltosharetext: Share this activity with your colleagues

field_underlogotext.processed: Boost your skills further by using our other online learning materials in the Boehringer Academy
